text: The 2011–12 Liga IV Teleorman was the 44th season of the Liga IV Teleorman, the fourth tier of the Romanian football league system. The season began on 20 August 2011 and ended on 2 June 2012. ==Teams changes== Viață Nouă Olteni lost the promotion play-off against Ștefanesti from Ilfov County and it will stay in Liga IV Teleorman. From Liga V Teleorman was promoted the winners of the two series, Ajax Botoroaga and Avântul Uda Clocociov, and the winner of the play-off match between the second place of the two series, Petrolul Poeni. Petrolul Videle II was dissolved and Pamimai Videle took their place in Liga IV. Avântul Uda Clocociov was renamed as Udinese Uda Clocociov. ==League table== ==See also== ===Main Leagues=== * 2011–12 Liga I * 2011–12 Liga II * 2011–12 Liga III * 2011–12 Liga IV ===County Leagues (Liga IV series)=== * 2011–12 Liga IV Alba * 2011–12 Liga IV Arad * 2011–12 Liga IV Botoșani * 2011–12 Liga IV Prahova * 2011–12 Liga IV Suceava ==References== ==External links== * Official website Category:Sport in Teleorman County
title: 2011–12 Liga IV Teleorman
